question: ‘Assess Koro Na’ is a new application being implemented in which Indian state/ UT, for containing the spread of Covid-19?
explanation:
The Delhi government has launched a new application called ‘Assess Koro Na’ and has directed its officials to use the new app to conduct door-to-door survey.
The survey is carried out in coronavirus containment zones, and with the real-time information collected through the app, the control centres can decide quickly if they require ambulances and medical equipment.
